name: Zephyr the Whisperwind
description: Born amidst a violent storm, Zephyr was taken in by a solitary hermit. Raised in solitude, Zephyr has honed her understanding of the wind and uses it to her advantage, becoming a whisper on the wind to her enemies.
personality_flaw: Zephyr often loses herself to the whims of the wind, finding it difficult to stay in one place or stick to one task for long.
quirk: Zephyr has a peculiar habit of speaking in a hushed voice, as if emulating the whispers of the wind.
